src_original: 4 kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati katamaiś caturbhiḥ yadutācāryagurudākṣiṇīyavisaṃvādanatayā /  5 pareṣām akaukṛtye kaukṛtyopasaṃhāraṇatayā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ  fol. 4r (KP-SI P/2)  1 ca satvānām avarṇāyaśakīrtiśabdaślokaniścāraṇatayā /  māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nādhyāśayena /
2 ebhiḥ kāśyapa caturbhiḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati /
tgt_original: 菩薩成就四法失菩提心。

src_original: gurudākṣiṇīye na karoti proktuṃ pareṣu kaukṛty' upasaṃharanti /
tgt_original: 一者謂於阿闍梨及餘師長而不尊重返生欺誑；

src_original: 4 ye ca satvās teṣām avarṇam ayaśaṃ bhaṇanti /
tgt_original: 二者無疑悔處令他疑悔；

src_original: māyāya śāṭhyena ca ketavena  paraṃ ca sevanti  5 ca nāśayena /  caturo ime dharma niṣevyamānā mohenti cittaṃ varabuddhabodhaye :  tasmād imān dharma niṣevamāṇo
tgt_original: 三者住大乘者而不稱讚段生罵辱； 四者與人從事心行諂詐而無正直。

src_original: 1 varāgrabodhāya sudūri vartate /  .. tādviparītas tu niṣevamāṇo varāgrabodhiṃ spṛśati praśāstāṃ   4 caturbhiḥ  2 kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisattvasya /  sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati
tgt_original: 復次迦葉！ 菩薩成就四法諸所生處得不捨離菩提之心，乃至坐菩提場相續現前。

src_original: 3 na cāntarā muhyati yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt* katamaiś caturbhiḥ yaduta jīvitahetor api saṃprajāna  4 mṛṣāvādaṃ na bhāṣate /  antamaśa hāsyaprekṣyam api /
tgt_original: 何等為四？ 一者設遇喪命因緣，不以忘語親近戲笑；

src_original: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā /
tgt_original: 二者與人從事，心行正直、離諸諂詐；

src_original: 5 sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayati /  caturdiśaṃ ca teṣāṃ varṇaṃ paricārayati /  1 yāś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān uttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau samādāpayati + + prādeśikayānaspṛhaṇatayā /  2 ebhiḥ kāśyapa caturbhiḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisattvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu
tgt_original: 三者於諸菩薩起議論想，隨所四方稱讚其名；
